website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, inexpensive piñata that will work for customers that don't have their heart set on a particular design as well as for party-goers with powerful swings.
pros: This durable pinata is easy to fill, and challenging enough to break that it builds exciting suspense
Has bold colors and fun graphics that kids and adults love
cons: Some customers were disappointed to receive a design that was much different than expected
Material can be difficult for young kids to break

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough that about 7 two-five yr olds took about 3 rounds of swings before it spilled open. Large enough that I fit plenty of prizes. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Meyer

customer_reviews.title: 12 eight year olds had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: 12 eight year olds had a blast! Great quality! This pinata took a beating (literally) and k ed put going. Every kid had at least 2 turns to punch the pinata with regulation boxing gloves before finally broke. Will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pinata for our Knight party!
customer_reviews.text: The valiant knights at my son's party loved slaying this dragon and reaping the glory of his candy guts! Kids ages were 7-11. We let them all have a round of wacking with their wooden stick swords, 2 rounds with a little league bat to burst the candy, and one last with their swords again to fully slay the dragon. Maybe thats morbid... But it was such a good construction that it was able to take such a beating. All the better for our valiant knights to all get a chance to get a few strikes in. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: As described, medium sized, beautiful red dragon piñata! Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome. We got exactly as pictured, it wouldn’t have mattered at all if a different color anyway. Perfect for my sons dragon-themed party. 8 kids whacked away at it for ages. I had read previous reviews saying that the hook from which you hang it was flimsy so we took the precaution of putting a rope around it’s neck as well and they loved it. Finally they slayed it!! Not too big and not too small. Would definitely buy this again, indeed we probably will for the next kiddos birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broke open too soon
customer_reviews.text: Although this pinata was super cute and fit plenty of candy, I was disappointed on how easily it broke open. Part of the fun is swinging and hitting it a lot before it breaks. My 2 year old hit it, my 4 year old hit it, then it broke open on my 7 year olds first swing. I feel like it should have lasted longer than that with just little kids hitting it. So I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: Great pinata for the little ones, doesn't hold a ton of candy though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's fourth birthday and it was sturdy enough for the dozen or so 4 year olds to have at least 10 swings each before we had a 12 year old cleanup batter come it to break it open. Great price and very sturdy. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: joe arnold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piñatas for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these piñatas! We have bought over 10 of theses we do them for ninja parties at our karate dojo! Awesome piñatas for an awesome price thank you will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Karate - hiya

customer_reviews.title: Family Reunion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the kids games at my family reunion. We had kids of all ages participate and this piñata was perfect. Everyone got a turn before candy came out. Would absolutely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Strong, yet allowed kids to (eventually) open
customer_reviews.text: We filled this thing to the top with candy. It was so heavy I was worried it wouldn’t hold up when we hung it. It only did it hold up, but it took quite a few good whacks before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: MLO123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My child and his friends loved this piñata!!! My child was the one who got to break it open at his party so that was extra exciting. Used for 2-5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Cute but super small
customer_reviews.text: This Piñata was super small, and the seller may have written the dimensions on the ad, but I didn't think to read them...The stuffing hole is small so if you do purchase this, your items need to be pretty small. Overall this was super average...
customer_reviews.author: Foodiechats

customer_reviews.title: Great dragon
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Held plenty of candy and broken open after a few kids got to take a wack at it. Adorable and brightly colored.
customer_reviews.author: EwokingOnSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good value, cute design
customer_reviews.text: Interesting that durability is one of the ratings 🤔 How durable do you want a pinata to be ?
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for our church party!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for the kids at our church. They hold plenty of candy/treats and are easy to fill from the hole on the dragon's neck. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Schoenleber

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little knights
customer_reviews.text: We looked everywhere locally for a dragon piñata to no avail. Took a chance and glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: Asimplemom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Went through many kids and many wacks. Held an 8lb bag of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dragon, resembles a dinosaur for dinosaur party.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! We had it for my sons 3rd Birthday Party! He actually wanted a dinosaur, but when I showed him this, he actually thought it was a dinosaur! Haha it was half the price of all the dinosaur piñatas we saw. It was sturdy and all of the kids got to hit it a few times!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute~
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet because the birthday isnt for a few months, but its perfect for our toddler and holds just enough candy.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbeanblue74

customer_reviews.title: A kid can break it after a bit!
customer_reviews.text: Held a lot of candy. Took a beating but still broke open after several minutes with my 7 yr old hitting it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Nice pinata
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy that pinata after I read the reviews, but it turned out to be a nice pinata. You need to buy a stick though, there is no cords to pull on like other pinatas. I bought a stick, but it was hard to break for 3-5 years old children. The pinata that I got was exactly the same as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute little pinata!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little pinata. Perfect for birthday party...only downside is it doesnt hold too much candy compared to other pinatas Ive used.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: However it arrived with the legs broken from the body. Not enough time to reorder so just hot glued it back on. Had 8, seven year olds give it a whack before the legs finally gave way. Held 4 pounds of candy. Would have given 5 stars if it had arrived in good condition. Had a few kids who were disappointed because they didn't get a turn.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany T

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than some I've bought in the past but still holds plenty of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter's Dragon Luau Birthday Party. It was an absolute hit! We had a line so all could have a chance to hit the pinata with a mixed age group. One hit from a 13 year old girl and we were in business! Product is adorable, all be it, not the color I would have chosen. It does clearly state in the ad that color WILL vary. I am completely happy with this product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly sturdy for being a cheaper pinata! It worked well for 6 kids to each hit several times before it started breaking open.
customer_reviews.author: Kshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Pinata, well built!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great piñata. I bought it for a party at taekwondo and it was great. Don't over stuff it or it will be harder to break.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute for a teen boy who loves dungeons and dragons!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Slay the dragon!
customer_reviews.text: Used for kids party. They enjoyed slaying the dragon. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit small but good construction
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a 1st birthday party but had older kids come (6-11) and they had a blast! I stuffed it with small toys instead of candy and that was an even bigger hit, but it didn't hold a heck of a lot. Luckily with only about 6 kids it did hold plenty for them, but if we had a bigger party & more kids I probably would want a larger pinata.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and held a bunch!
customer_reviews.text: This was great! Worked perfect for my son's 3rd birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Have not had the party yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a two-year-old's birthday party. Very cute- looked exactly as pictured. Arrived in perfect condition. Have not had the party yet but both the party parents love it! It will be a fun addition to the gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Small otherwise awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! But it’s small, worked great for our unicorn and dragons birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Ifteda Laban

customer_reviews.title: Cute pinata
customer_reviews.text: Good pinatas, but didn't have a place to tie to string up. We rigged it to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Was a *hit* at a party
customer_reviews.text: This pinata withstood many a blow from well trained knights before succumbing to its wounds and spilling its candy innards. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Pastore

customer_reviews.title: great hit.
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute & adorable perfect for young kids. One downside is they are made of heavy duty cadboard which cannot be opened by young kids & no pull strings for little hands. I actually had to cut this open. If it was made easier for kids I would change to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter's birthday party. It was the perfect size, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LeBuda

customer_reviews.title: To hard to bust open
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bigger than i expected and it was alot nicer than i expected but it was very hard to bust open its way to tjick it took a adult three hard hits to open
customer_reviews.author: siera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Hobbit birthday party (we got red)
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter's had a hobbit themed joint birthday party and this (in red) stood in as Smaug. Daugher number one took her three swings and Smaug was undaunted. Daughter number two smote Smaug in two with her first mighty swing!
customer_reviews.author: Desfam

customer_reviews.title: Kids Loved It
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a medieval party for kids aged 3-8. They all loved it. It was a bit difficult to break open, but that just prolonged the fun. The dragon was easy to stuff and the candy and toys came out easily. They talked about how "slaying the dragon" was one of the highlights of the party.
customer_reviews.author: taaj

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the party...However, I received 4!!! Lol...do I send three back???
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a party
customer_reviews.text: The kids have fun whacking this. We called this game slaying the dragon but the plastic sword made it difficult for the kids to break the thick cardboard. We ended up having to use a baseball hat. It's well made but really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Go Lucky

customer_reviews.title: A real “hit”!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a kids birthday. We used it for my son’s Dragons Love Tacos birthday party and it was a “hit.”
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Griffin

customer_reviews.title: We loved this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a 4-yr knight/princess-themed birthday party and it was the perfect size and toughness. All of the kids (about 10) had a chance to hit it a few times. At first, I thought it was difficult to stuff the pinata, but I removed a small square cardboard and it did not change the pinata and I could fit more things inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Dragon Pinata
customer_reviews.text: Rated this piñata when I bought them in 2009 for the village school children in Ghana, they loved them and enjoyed the candy they found inside.
customer_reviews.author: I. G. King

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable, perfect for a small kids birthday party
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable, perfect for a small kids birthday party. Won't hold a lot, but just enough for a few handfuls of trinkets and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, was sturdy and the kids had fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 5th princess and knight birthday party and it was a hit! It's on the smaller side but for the 5 year olds it was perfect! Easy to fill w candy recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RyeNeckMom

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Dragon!
customer_reviews.text: Pinata arrived today, I didn't read that it came in assorted colors and I received a RED dragon but that is just fine. My Daughter loves it and it appears well made. Very happy with the purchase for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: only problem I had with it was that it was actually pretty hard to break
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as pictured, only problem I had with it was that it was actually pretty hard to break. The broom stick we were using broke in half before we could even make a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Gerson Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not worth the disappointment of a party full of four year olds.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this one star, but it is incredibly cute. The thing is made out of cardboard! Super thick, incredibly hard to break open cardboard! My four year old and her friends could not get this to break open. It was quite sad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bolton

customer_reviews.title: a bit hard to bust
customer_reviews.text: worked out well, just a bit hard for little kids to bust open.
customer_reviews.author: S. Linn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to break open. Paper was coming off in a couple places.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: dragon pinata
customer_reviews.text: Gragon arrived on time, great condtion. its solid so my husbandcut a few hidden slits in it to make it go faster for my 3yr olds party.even when my seven yr old took hard swings it barely opened. Had to shake the candy out. The kids still ahd a blast
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Roth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pinata
customer_reviews.text: Smashing this was probably one of the best moments of my life. Not only did candy go flying everywhere (You have to fill it with your own candy), but it was super satisfying to see it burst open. Definitely a good choice in terms of pinatas.
customer_reviews.author: HolyWind

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good quality pinata. It did not break super easy. All the kids got a chance to hit it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: wish you could select color ....
customer_reviews.text: Adorable .. a little smaller than anticipated and wish I could have selected the color. But overall a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Decker

customer_reviews.title: Baby Dragon
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby shower it's great just right size. Mine was red. Haven't filled it yet so I can't comment on how much it can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Dragon pinata
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it was quick to arrive and we enjoyed filling it up with goodies and look forward to using it at our party
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard!
customer_reviews.text: This pinata was cute - looked exactly like the picture. It was easy to fill and held a fair bit of candy. I thought it would be easier to break open than other pinatas we have had in the past, which was important because the age range of the kids at our party was 2-5. However, when they finally managed to break it, it just ripped down the seam from the top where the hanger was and we had to turn it upside down and dump the candy out. Turns out it was made entirely of corrugated cardboard (not paper mache like traditional pinatas)and just covered with tissue. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ontariomom

product_meta.title: Aztec Imports Dragon Pinata (Colors may vary)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A boy's Knights Party can't miss this Dragon Pinata.
feature_bullets: Makes great decoration and fun party game at theme birthday parties
Made of cardboard and tissue paper
Pinata can be filled with up to 2lbs of toys and candy
Includes strong cable tie at the top for hanging pinata

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
